channel.title: Academy on SwissRN
channel.description: Recent content in Academy on SwissRN

item.title: SwissRN Academy
item.description: The first event of the Swiss Reproducibility Network Academy will take place online on Friday, February 25 from 16:00 to 17:15. It will be an informal event where we will talk about why reproducibility and open science matter to us/you. We will also discuss future events. The (tentative) program is the following: 16:00 - 16:30 : presentations (from us/you) + discussion 16:30 - 16:50 : networking (getting to know each other) 16:50 - 17:15 : future activities + closing remarks
